title: 'Good'
body: 'Good sanitary pads made with cotton. Non irritating and feels good.'

title: 'Excellent'
body: 'It is very soft..not causing any rash.. it could have been bit longer for night use'

title: 'Very soft and comfortable'
body: 'These are super comfortable and very soft'

title: 'Good for minimal flow'
body: 'Soft cotton pads for 1-2 hrs more than this period cotton gets disbursed.'

title: 'No difference'
body: 'Cottony soft but same the smell and itching in vaginal tract after using this same as normal which we purchase in near by shops like whisper and  stay free.'

title: 'Good one'
body: 'It is more thicker than regular pad extra softness.nice product'

title: 'Plasticky cover'
body: 'I had used the blue cover pads which were so soft and cottony. These were awful and platicky'

title: 'Looks small but totally power packed'
body: At first I was skeptical as size and thickness didn't coerce with the heavy bleeding level on the package. But totally surprised by its performance. Extremely light and thin and regular size (like XL of Whisper) but very good on second day, throughout night. Please try this once if you're looking for a reliable change.

title: 'Soft cotton pads'
body: 'These pads will take you back to the late 90s when soft cotton pads were a thing. Unlike the latest ones which are ultra thin and flat Bella napkins give you that soft cushioning. At the time of disposing you can remove the soiled cotton and flush it. The outer plastic can be disposed into the dry waste bin. No itchy feel no second guessing no leakage nor rash. I highly recommend this. I bought this pack out of curiosity and looking at the price point value for money. Pleasantly surprised as it ticks all the boxes. Ladies give these a try.'

title: 'Very high absorption'
body: 'Product is very good and absorption is very high  it met my expectations and used Bella Pantyliners and both napkins a and pantyliners are very soft and good for skin.'
